data.title: Independent Scandinavian Capitals & Fjords
data.meta_description: Enjoy vacation with our Private tour template of 5 cities in Denmark, Norway, Sweden or customize it to your needs. Build your own travel itinerary with Triptile trip planner!
data.text:
Arrival

Welcome to the historical "harbor of merchants" and the outstanding capital of Denmark - Copenhagen! Upon arrival, you are met by your private driver, who transfers you to the hotel for check-in.

The rest of the day is free so you can start exploring the magnificent city center on your own, dine in one of the local restaurants or take a good rest in your comfortable room.

Departure

After breakfast you check out from your hotel and spend the rest of the morning at your leisure.

In the afternoon your driver transfers you to the port.

Arrival

Your private driver meets you at the port and transfers you to your centrally located hotel to leave your luggage.

The rest of the day is free so you can start exploring the magnificent city center on your own, dine in one of the local restaurants or take a good rest in your comfortable room.

Departure

After breakfast you check out from your hotel and spend the rest of the morning at your leisure.

In the afternoon you walk to the pier (easily accessible by foot) to enjoy a 5,5-hour express boat trip from Flam to Bergen. This is a wonderful experience definitely worth trying! Bergen is the second largest city in Norway which boasts magnificent nature and you will be able to contemplate the panorama of the area from the very beginning of the trip.

Note: Express boat operates from May till September. During the winter season boat is substituted with train.

Arrival

Upon arrival you walk to your hotel located very close to the boat station for overnight.

The evening is free for you to go on sightseeing, dining or just walking around in Bergen.

Arrival

Upon arrival, you have a transfer to the centrally located hotel.

The rest of the day is free to start exploring Stockholm attractions on your own, dine in a local restaurant or take a good rest in your comfortable room.

Departure

This is the last day of the tour, your driver meets you at the hotel lobby after breakfast. You are transferred to the airport and depart home with a handful of memorable experiences.

We will be happy to plan another vacation for you!
